Text.Page:
You have defeated the four hatchlings!
Celebrate your victory quickly. By now, Vergos knows his children are dead, and his wrath will be cataclysmic.
But you were able to slay the four, so you might have what it takes to slay Vergos himself.
Are you ready? If not, I can send you back out to finish preparing.
Listen...that roaring! Vergos draws near...may the gods be with us all.<TEXTBUTTON>Get ready for the battle</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Start the battle</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
